text: ਸਤਰਿ ਸੈਇ ਸਲਾਰ ਹੈ ਜਾ ਕੇ ॥
section: Bhairao - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

transliteration.text: satar saii salār hai jā kē .

melody.description: Bhairao embodies the soul’s faith and heartfelt devotion towards The Creator. It is a kind of fanaticism, where there is a feeling of not being aware or caring about anything else. The emotions conveyed are those of contentment and of being absorbed in a steadfast belief or faith. In this Raag, the soul is relaying the happiness that the mind could potentially experience if it joined in with this devotion.

author.author: Guru Arjan Dev
author.description:
Guru Arjan Dev [1563 - 1606] was the fifth Guru of the Sikhs, born at Goindval. He was the youngest of the three sons of Guru Ram Das, the fourth Sikh Guru.

Guru Arjan Dev finished the construction of the Harimandir Sahib, the Golden Temple, and compiled the first Sikh scripture, known as the Adi Granth. Shortly after he became the first martyr of the Sikh religion, which formed a turning point in the development of the faith.

section: Bhairao - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: and hundreds of thousands of prophets;

melody.description: Bhairao embodies the soul’s faith and heartfelt devotion towards The Creator. It is a kind of fanaticism, where there is a feeling of not being aware or caring about anything else. The emotions conveyed are those of contentment and of being absorbed in a steadfast belief or faith. In this Raag, the soul is relaying the happiness that the mind could potentially experience if it joined in with this devotion.

section: Bhairao - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: He is said to have 88,000,000 shaykhs,

text: ਛਪਨ ਕੋਟਿ ਜਾ ਕੇ ਖੇਲ ਖਾਸੀ ॥੧॥
section: Bhairao - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

transliteration.text: shapan kōt jā kē khēl khāsī .1.

section: Bhairao - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: I am meek and poor - what chance do I have of being heard there?

melody.description: Bhairao embodies the soul’s faith and heartfelt devotion towards The Creator. It is a kind of fanaticism, where there is a feeling of not being aware or caring about anything else. text: ਮਜਲਸਿ ਦੂਰਿ ਮਹਲੁ ਕੋ ਪਾਵੈ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
section: Bhairao - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: His Court is so far away; only a rare few attain the Mansion of His Presence. ||1||Pause||

transliteration.text: majalas dūr mahal kō pāvai .1. rahāu .

melody.description: Bhairao embodies the soul’s faith and heartfelt devotion towards The Creator. translation.text: His beings wander insanely through 8.4 million incarnations.

text: ਬਾਬਾ ਆਦਮ ਕਉ ਕਿਛੁ ਨਦਰਿ ਦਿਖਾਈ ॥
section: Bhairao - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: He bestowed His Grace on Adam, the father of mankind,

transliteration.text: bābā ādam kau kish nadar dikhāī .

translation.text: who then lived in paradise for a long time. ||2||

text: ਦਿਲ ਖਲਹਲੁ ਜਾ ਕੈ ਜਰਦ ਰੂ ਬਾਨੀ ॥
section: Bhairao - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: Pale are the faces of those whose hearts are disturbed.

transliteration.text: dil khalahal jā kai jarad rū bānī .

translation.text: You are the Great Giver, O Lord; I am forever a beggar at Your Door.

translation.text: Keep me near You, O Merciful Lord God - that is heaven for me. ||4||7||15||
